user_query: I want to achieve my weight loss goals and need to calculate my daily caloric requirements. Considering my weight of 70 kg, height of 180 cm, age of 25 years, and male gender, please provide me with the necessary information. Additionally, I would like to know the met values for various activities.

TaskList.description: Calculate the Basal Metabolic Rate (BMR) using the provided weight, height, age, and gender.
Calculate the Total Daily Energy Expenditure (TDEE) based on the BMR from Step 1 and the activity level.
Provide a list of MET (Metabolic Equivalent of Task) values for various activities.
